title: Verify Updated Logo in Scoreboard - Game In Progress
custom_preconds: Given the user is in the Scoreboard
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a day in which the Astros are playing
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros logo will appear in the game cell

title: Verify Updated Logo In Scoreboard - Game In Preview State
custom_preconds:
Given the user is in the Scoreboard
And there is an Astros game is in a preview state
custom_steps: When the cell for the game is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the drawer will expand
And the new Astros logo will appear in the drawer as well as in the game cell

title: Verify Updated Logo in Game Preview Page
custom_preconds: Given there is an Astros game on the schedule not in progress
custom_steps: When the game cell is tapped on the out of town scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the preview page will contain the updated Astros logo

title: Verify Updated Logo on Wrap Page
custom_preconds: Given there is a completed Astros game on the schedule
custom_steps: When the user accesses the Wrap page
custom_expected: Then the new Astros logo will appear on either the upper left (road game)/upper right (home game)

title: Verify Updated Logo in Summary > Plays
custom_preconds: Given the Astros have a game on the schedule(final, in progress, etc...)
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to Gameday
And taps on the Summary tab
And the user taps on the Plays button
custom_expected: Then the updated Houston Astros logo will appear at the top of each corresponding inning's half depending on where they are batting

title: Verify Update Logo in Summary > Scoring
custom_preconds: Given the Astros have a game on the schedule(final, in progress, etc...)
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to Gameday
And taps on the Summary tab
And taps on the Scoring button
custom_expected: Then all innings in which the Astros scored will contain the new logo to the left of the inning's header

title: Tabbed icon for favorite team - When the Astros are your favorite team, the tab for the team page should reflect the new team icon - verify on both retina and nonretina
custom_preconds:
Given the user is in the Teams view
Or the user is in the Favorite Teams view
custom_steps: When the Houston Astros are set as the user's favorite team
custom_expected: Then the new Houston Astros logos will appear as a tab tray icon in the lower left an both retina and non-retina devices

title: Verify that the tab icon has both a color and grayscale image (when selected and not selected)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has set Houston as the favorite team
And the Astros team logo appears in the tab tray as an icon
custom_steps: When the icon is tapped
custom_expected:
The the icon will appear in full color when tapped & the user is in the team's page
Or the icon will appear in greyscale when the user is not on the team page

title: Team page header - verify the team page header image has been updated with the new team logo
custom_preconds: Given the Astros have been set up as the favorite team
custom_steps: When the user opens the Astros team page in the app
custom_expected: Then the new logo will appear in the top navbar in the correct colors

title: MLB icon on the upper left of Team Page - Tapping gear icon should bring user to 'Notifications' page for team, verify icon in top navbar is updated to new logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Astros Team Page
And taps on the MLB icon in the upper left of the Team Page
custom_steps: When the gear icon to right of the Houston Astros team name is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the notifications page for the Astros will open
And the logo in top navbar will be updated to represent the new team logo

title: 2012 Results - Calendar view should show the correct logo when tapping on a day that a game was played
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Astros team page
custom_steps:
When the Schedule content button is tapped
And the Calendar button at the top of the team calendar page is tapped
And the user has tapped any date in the calendar in which there is an Astros game
custom_expected:
Then the schedule will display the new Astros colors
And tapping on a game shows the correct logo in Preview/Wrap
(compare with older version for color differences)

title: When sorting 'By Team' - Verify team icon is updated for Houston Astros
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the News/Video icon in the tab tray
And is in the News view
custom_steps: When the MLB logo/team logo in the upper left corner is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Astros will be listed under the AL West header
And the Astros team logo will be updated to represent the new team logo

title: When sorting 'By Team' - the Houston Astros cell should open the Astros news index without issue.
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped the News/Video icon in the tab tray
And is in the News view
custom_steps:
When the MLB logo/team logo in the upper left corner is tapped
And the user has tapped on the Houston Astros cell from the Filter index
custom_expected:
Then all Astros related articles will open
And the filter button in the upper left will be labeled with the new Astros' logo

title: Verify News Filter Page Shows Updated Logo and Division
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the News/Video view
And has tapped on the Highlights button
custom_steps: When the filter button in the upper left is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros will appear under the AL West header
And the team cell will be updated to reflect the new Astros logo

title: Verify Tapping Astros Cell Opens Correct Highlights Page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the Video button
And has tapped on the video button located on the top
custom_steps:
When the filter button in the upper left is tapped
And the Houston Astros cell is tapped
custom_expected:
Then Houston Astros video page will open
And the filter button in the upper left will update to reflect the new Astros logo

title: More > Teams - New logo/division should be verified
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the More section 
And the Astros have not been set as the favorite team
custom_steps: When the Favorite Teams cell is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros will appear under the AL West section
And the Astros logo will update to represent the new logo

title: Verify Astros Logo and Division Are Updated
custom_preconds:
Given the user has not set up a favorite team
And has navigated to the More menu
custom_steps: When the Teams cell is tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros will be listed under the AL West heading
And the team logo will be updated to reflect the new Astros logo

title: Verify Updated Logo on Jumbotron
custom_preconds: Given there is a Houston game in progress
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Gameday view
custom_expected: Then the new Houston Astros logo will appear in the Jumbotron scoreboard's linescore

title: Verify Updated Logo in Plays Overlay
custom_preconds:
Given there is a Houston game in progress
And the user navigates to the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Plays overlay button
custom_expected: Then both the "At Bats" and "Scoring" sections will properly display the Houston Astros new logo

title: Verify Updated Logo in Lineups
custom_preconds:
Given there is an Astros game in progress
And the user has navigated to the Gameday view
custom_steps: When the Lineups button is tapped
custom_expected: Then the Houston Astros logo will be visible to the left of the Lineup header

title: Verify Updated Logo on Player Cards
custom_preconds: Given there is an Astros game in progress
custom_steps: When the user taps accesses Astros player cards
custom_expected: Then the new Astros logo will be visible

title: Verify Update Logo on Team Recap Articles
custom_preconds:
Given an Astros game has gone into a final state
And the user is in the Wrap view
custom_steps: When the team recap article link appears on the Wrap screen
custom_expected: Then new Astros logo will appear to the left of the article

title: Verify Updated Logo on 15 Game Scoreboard Cell
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps: When there are Astros' games on the schedule
custom_expected: Then the cell will contain the new Astros logo (please check several dates to confirm)

title: Verify Updated Logo on Game Preview
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
custom_steps:
When there are Astros' games on the schedule that are not in progress
And the user taps on the Astros' game cell
custom_expected: Then the game preview will contain the new Astros logo (please check several dates to confirm)

title: Verify Updated Logo in Box Score > "View Play By Play" Link
custom_preconds: Given there is an Astros game on the schedule(final, in progress, etc...)
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the tile for the game
And if the game is in a Final state tap on the 'Plays' tab on the top
And if the game is in progress tap on the 'Plays' tab at the bottom nav bar
custom_expected:
Then the 'At Bats' section & the 'Scoring Plays' section will display the new Astros logo
And tapping the numbered inning links to the right will open scoring plays for the corresponding inning
And all Astros scoring will contain the new logo in the inning header

title: Verify Updated Logo on Team Filter Button
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the News view
custom_steps: When the MLB News filter button has been tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astro will appear in the teams index along with their new logo to the left
And selecting them from the index will open all team-related articles 
And their new logo, along with team name will appear in the filter button in place of MLB News

title: Verify Updated Logo and Division
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Team schedules page
custom_steps: When reviewing the team index
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros logo will be updated to represent the new logo
And they will be listed under the AL West Division

title: Verify Updated Logo in Upper Right Corner of Calendar
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigate to Team Schedules
custom_steps: When the Houston Astros cell is tapped in the team index
custom_expected:
Then the Astros schedule will open
And the new team logo will appear in the upper right hand corner of each of their calendar pages

title: Verify Updated Logo in Favorite Teams
custom_preconds: Given the user has navigated to the Setting page
custom_steps: When the Favorite teams cell has been tapped
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros will appear under the AL West header
And the team logo will be updated

title: Verify Logo in Top Navbar During Video Playback
custom_preconds: Given there is an Astros on MLB.TV
custom_steps:
When video playback is begun
And overlays have not been toggled off
custom_expected: Then the new Astros logo will display in the top navbar above the out of town scoreboard

title: Verify Logo Plays Overlay (At Bats and Scoring)
custom_preconds: Given the user has begun video playback of an Astros game(live or archive)
custom_steps: When the Plays overlay is accessed
custom_expected:
Then the At Bats will display the new Astros logo to the left of each inning's header at either the top or bottom of the inning
And if the Scoring button is tapped, the new Astros logo will appear to the left of each of the inning headers in which the Astros scored

title: Verify Logo in Lineup Overlay Header
custom_preconds: Given the user has started playback of an Astros game on MLB.TV(live or archive)
custom_steps: When the Lineups icon is tapped
custom_expected: Then the new Astros logo will appear to the left of the Astros Lineup header

title: Verify Updated Logo on Player Cards
custom_preconds: Given the user has begun playback of a Astros game (live or archive)
custom_steps: When tapping on a player's name in any of the overlays for the Astros
custom_expected:
Then the player's card will open
And the Astros' new logo will appear in the top right hand corner of the card (please confirm this on all overlays)
